articles.title: Natural Gas Prices Break Out to Fresh Highs on Strong LNG Demand - FX Empire
articles.description: The weather is expected to be colder than normal increasing mid-West heating demand
articles.content: Natural gas prices broke out to fresh 13-year highs and are poised to trend higher. Target resistance is seen near the July 2008 highs at 13.68. Support is seen near the 10-day moving average at 5.93… [+431 chars]
